multiplechoiceresponse.p: In Trainingland, use the search field to search for all dashboards with Malaria in the title.

label.h3: How many malaria dashboards are there in Trainingland and what are their names?

choicegroup.choice: 3 dashboards: Malaria Type, Malaria Treatment, Malaria Maps
4 dashboards: Malaria Treatment, Malaria Burden Reduction, Malaria Elimination, Malaria Maps
4 dashboards: Malaria Burden Reduction, Malaria Elimination, Malaria Maps, Malaria Trends and Coverage

div.p: In Trainingland, if you search for ‘Malaria’ in the search field, you will see 4 available dashboards: Malaria Burden Reduction, Malaria Elimination, Malaria Maps, Malaria Trends and Coverage.
